page.title: 13"WHY I LIKE CUMBERNAULD"(1)
page.content: My family and I like Cumbernauld a lot.I have lived here all my life and I don't think I will ever leave. There are a lot of schools we could go to which are all close to home. We live on a Wimpey Estate which is next to Whitelees Primary School. It is very quiet because the factories are far away from us on their own Industial Estates. Cumbernauld has a lot of facilities for people about my age (12). We could go swimming or up to the Town Centre where there is a great selection of shops. The good thing about being able to go to these places is that wherever we go we never have to cross any main roads because there is a system where pedestrians have their own footpaths, bridges and underpasses.
